name: Path to a Dark Tower
description:
Along a dark and dreary path, heroes venture to find the Dark Tower.  It's up to you and your mystic defenses to protect the Dark Tower.  But this task won't be easy, as the heroes in this tale fight back, destroying what you've worked so hard to build.

Special Thanks to:  FadedSketch & Duroxxigar

This project would not have been possible without their help.
